short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will open dailyhabits in new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is meant to serve as a shortcut for users of dailyhabits.xyz to be able to access their app as soon as they open a new tab on chrome.

It will save you the trouble of entering the app URL in the browser when a new tab is opened.
